page.title: 04Farms.
page.content: Westfield Farm cont. disturb farm animals. Both farms can be approached from the Harbury Road off the Fosse Way. Hill Farm. Hill Farm is situated to the south of the village of Radford Semele, just off the A425 -Leamington to Southam road. It is a mixed farm but mainly concentrates on live-stock. There is a main farm building with several outbuildings. The owners Mr.and Mrs. Gibbs and family live in the farm house which is also an A.A. recommended guest house which is very popular during the summer when visitors from all over the world come to local areas of interest,Stratford,Leamington and Warwick.
